description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has edited the `Microsoft.IdentityServer.Servicehost.exe.config` file to load a malicious DLL into the AD FS process, thereby enabling persistent access to any service federated with AD FS for a user with a specified User Principal Name.(Citation: MagicWeb)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center, Microsoft Detection and Response Team, Microsoft 365 Defender Research Team . (2022, August 24). MagicWeb: NOBELIUMâ€™s post-compromise trick to authenticate as anyone. Retrieved September 28, 2022.
